scripts.cocos-compile: rimraf publish && cocos compile -p web -s ./app -m release -o ./publish
scripts.debug: npm run cocos-run && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron --dev --debug-brk=5858 .
scripts.start: npm run cocos-compile && npm run start-app
scripts.build:win32: npm run cocos-compile && cross-env USE_SYSTEM_WINE=true DEBUG=*,-not_this build --win --dir --x64
scripts.build: npm run cocos-compile && cross-env DEBUG=electron-builder,electron-builder:* build --dir
scripts.build:mac: npm run cocos-compile && cross-env DEBUG=electron-builder,electron-builder:* build --mac
scripts.pack:winsetup: npm run cocos-compile && cross-env DEBUG=*,-not_this node ./build/setup/build-win-setup --x64
scripts.pack:win: npm run build:win32 && npm run pack:winsetup -- --full --verbose
